entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain in the evening. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
